author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/joanna-menagh/4421090, http://www.abc.net.au/news/briana-shepherd/6843240
title: The horrors of the Warminda hostel and the children who were never heard. Until now
description: Martin Cooper was supposed to care for vulnerable children, but instead subjected them to horrendous and repeated physical and sexual abuse. Now 40 years on, justice has finally been served.
